Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron frowned. "I want this group as an ally. And this is not helping." 
he sent a comm to Future Zardus right next to halucegagen. "Please Zardus. MY 
bot here was mistaken and his actions where not sanctioned by me. I wish this 
not to hurt our oppurtunity to work togeather. Turn him over to me and I 
shall punish him myself." he went back to his convo with hal.. "If this 
doesnt work then we shall try your plan."

--part1_147.dccc4c.28c271a9_boundary
